price: Deε wͻn a wͻ nnye nnie no ka nesε: “Adεn nti na yensiane nsεnkyerεnee mfri ne Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ mmrε no? (Nkͻmhyεni), wodeε ne sε woyε kͻkͻbͻni; na ͻman biara nso wͻ ͻkwankyerεfoͻ.
arabic: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦٓۗ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُنذِرٞۖ وَلِكُلِّ قَوۡمٍ هَادٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlu alladhīna kafarū lawlā unzila ʿalayhi āyatun min rabbihi innamā anta mundhirun walikulli qawmin hādin
